channel.title: Dots and Boxes on CARIN Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Dots and Boxes on CARIN Thomas

item.title: Project III : Dots and Boxes AI
item.description: In this school project, we have to program an AI playing the game Dots and Boxes. Our AI will be evaluated in a tournament where all the AI of the class are attending. I’m currently programming a handmade algorithm, and after that I will train a Reinforcement Learning AI against my algorithm. There is not much content now, because I just started the project. But I will update this project page during the project, so stay in touch !
